FuncDef: This command specifies the python-script for the specified PPPoE message type in the specified direction. Multiplepppoecommand configuration are allowed in the same Python policy.
CLIs: pppoe type direction { ingress | egress } script <name>
no pppoe type direction { ingress | egress }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the message type. Values-session-lcp, session-pap, session-chap, session-ipcp, session-ip6cp, pado, padi, padr, pads, padt.
Specifies whether the event is incoming or outgoing. The system will only invoke the configured script for the specified packet type in the specified direction.
Specifies the name of the Python script up to 32 characters, that will be used to handle the specified message.
